thread.title: Ericsson third-quarter operating profit lags forecasts
thread.title_full: Ericsson third-quarter operating profit lags forecasts

title: Ericsson third-quarter operating profit lags forecasts
text:
Ericsson third-quarter operating profit lags forecasts STOCKHOLM The exterior of Ericsson's headquarters are seen in Stockholm April 30, 2009. Reuters/Bob Strong 
STOCKHOLM Swedish mobile telecom equipment maker Ericsson posted third-quarter sales and operating profit below market expectations on Friday, weighed down by its key networks unit. 
Operating profit was 5.1 billion Swedish crowns ($604 million) compared to 3.9 billion in the year-ago quarter and below a mean forecast of 5.4 billion crowns in a Reuters poll of analysts. 
Sales at Ericsson, the world number one mobile network equipment maker, were 59.2 billion crowns, below a forecast of 60.9 billion. The gross margin was 33.9 percent against a mean forecast of 34.9 percent. 
(Reporting by Sven Nordenstam and Olof Swahnberg; Editing by Alistair Scrutton )
